templates.name: fail2ban
templates.title: Fail2Ban by Neomediatech (on Ubuntu 20.04)
templates.description: Dockerized Fail2Ban
templates.note:
ENV parameters below can be omitted if you put them in /data/config.ini

crea le varie directory:

BASE_DIR='/srv/data/docker/containers/fail2ban'
mkdir -p $BASE_DIR/{action.d,db,filter.d,jail.d,log} && chmod 777 $BASE_DIR/{action.d,db,filter.d,jail.d,log}

env.name: SSMTP_HOST
env.label: SSMTP_HOST
env.description: SMTP to use to send notifications

templates.name: nextcloud
templates.title: Nextcloud app
templates.description: Nextcloud, OnlyOffice, Nginx, MariaDB, FPM, Redis, cron
templates.note:
WARNING!!!

Before starting this stack you need to create this files in /var/lib/mysql container directory:
- 'db-name.txt' (write in this file the name of the Nextcloud database)
- 'db-nextcloud.pwd' (password for the Nextcloud database user)
- 'db-root.pwd' (password for the MariaDB root user)
- 'db-user.txt' (name for the Nextcloud database user)

Otherwise this stack will not works

env.name: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.label: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.description: Path for the stack. Must exists before launching this stack!

env.name: JWT_SECRET
env.label: JWT_SECRET
env.description: Put here the secret taken from Nextcloud config.php (jwt_secret parameter)

env.description: limit the tools shown in the web frontend: testssl, ping, traceroute, nmap

env.name: RATE_LIMIT
env.label: RATE_LIMIT
env.description: (Optional) Rate limit - Limits the number of calls of a specific tool to a specific target (e.g. host). The value is set in milliseconds between consecutive calls.

env.name: INTRO_TEXT
env.label: INTRO_TEXT
env.description: (Optional) Show an additional paragraph in front of the tool selection. This can be used to help the users in your specific environment. HTML tags are supported.

templates.description: Radicale is a CalDAV (calendars, to-do lists) and CardDAV (contacts) server
templates.note:
create folders:

BASE_DIR='/srv/data/docker/containers/radicale'
mkdir -p $BASE_DIR/data && chmod 777 $BASE_DIR/data

env.label: IMAP_HOST
env.description: IMAP host to connect to

env.name: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.label: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.description: Path for the stack. Must exists before launching this stack!

templates.title: OPC Router
templates.description: No-code middleware for industrial applications. The OPC Router connects PLCs, PCS, SCADA, MES, SQL databases and servers, label printers, e-mail servers and erp-systems via OPC UA, MQTT, REST, CSV and many others without any programming effort
templates.note: More information about the EULA.

templates.title: Floating License Server
templates.description: License Server for Softing edgeConnector products

templates.title: EdgeConnector Modbus
templates.description: Connect Modbus TCP Sensors/PLCs and provide the data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: EdgeConnector 840D
templates.description: Access Siemens SINUMERIK 840D sl/pl controllers and provide data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: EdgeConnector Siemens
templates.description: Connect Siemens SIMATIC S7-300/400/1200/1500 PLCs and provide the data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: EdgeConnector FANUC CNC
templates.description: Connect FANUC CNCs and provide the data via OPC UA and MQTT

templates.title: EdgeConnector Aggregator
templates.description: Offers a powerful OPC UA aggregation service which provides data via OPC UA, as well as MQTT

templates.title: Portainer Agent
templates.description: Manage all the resources in your Swarm cluster
templates.note: The agent will be deployed globally inside your cluster and available on port 9001.

templates.note: Deploys the API gateway and sample functions. You can access the UI on port 8080. Warning: the name of the stack must be 'func'.

templates.description: Open-source serverless computing platform
templates.note: Deploys the IronFunctions API and UI.

templates.title: CockroachDB
templates.description: CockroachDB cluster
templates.note: Deploys an insecure CockroachDB cluster, please refer to CockroachDB documentation for production deployments.

env.label: MPS Secret
env.description: Strong secret key used to log into MPS.

env.name: VAULT_SECRET
env.label: Vault secret
env.description: Secret token used to log into Vault (don't include '.' character).

templates.title: Dokku
templates.description: Dokku setup as a compose file

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Dokku version
env.description: Version of Dokku to use ('latest' if empty)

env.name: DOKKU_HOSTNAME
env.label: Dokku hostname
env.description: Global hostname to be registered by Dokku

env.name: VOLUME_PATH
env.label: Dokku volume path
env.description: Host path to be bound to /mnt/dokku (`/var/lib/dokku` if empty)

env.name: DOKKU_HOST_ROOT
env.label: Dokku host root
env.description: Image build cache path. Generally set to <data dir> + '/home/dokku'

env.name: SSH_PORT
env.label: SSH port
env.description: Host port to expose SSH port of Dokku (22 if empty)

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: HTTP port
env.description: Host port to expose HTTP port of Dokku (80 if empty)

env.name: HTTPS_PORT
env.label: HTTPS port
env.description: Host port to expose HTTPS port of Dokku (443 if empty)
